casebody.data:
Shreve
v.
N.C. Dept. of Justice, et al. 151P14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Kimberly Shreve, for Shreve, Kimberly. Christopher McLennan, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Justice, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of March 2016 by Plaintiff for Review and Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
